publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6131 Karen Gillon: Aleke Banda—That the Parliament offers its sincere condolences to the family, friends and colleagues of Aleke Banda, a former Malawian MP, who has died aged 71; recognises his immense contribution to the struggle for democracy in Malawi, his role in strengthening Malawi’s multiparty democracy, particularly in his ministerial roles in finance and agriculture, as a Member of Parliament for Nkhata Bay and in his determination to see a free and fair media; welcomes the role that Aleke Banda played in building links between Malawi and Scotland, and considers him a giant of Malawian politics and a man who will be sorely missed.

S3M-6131 Aleke Banda (lodged on 13 April 2010) Helen Eadie*, Pauline McNeill*, Elaine Smith*, Linda Fabiani*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Mike Pringle*, Mary Mulligan*, Sarah Boyack*, Jamie Hepburn*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Murdo Fraser*, Sandra White*, Bill Wilson*, Robin Harper*, Michael Matheson*, Willie Coffey*, Gil Paterson*, Maureen Watt*
S3M-6131 Aleke Banda (lodged on 13 April 2010) Brian Adam*, Trish Godman*, Jack McConnell*, Elaine Murray*, Dave Thompson*
